text: Donald Fox was an American bobsledder who competed in the late 1930s. He won a bronze medal in the four-man event at the 1937 FIBT World Championships in St. Moritz. ==References== *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 Category:American male bobsledders Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Donald Fox (bobsleigh)
